instruction: Produce a list of 10 idioms relating to the given topic.
output:

2. Feel the Weight of the World on your Shoulders
3. Carry a Heavy Heart
4. Weep Bitter Tears
5. Reach the End of Your Rope
6. All Fun and Games Until
7. Drive Yourself to Distraction
8. Been Through the Mill
9. Emotional Rollercoaster
10. Hit Rock Bottom
